LanguageData.HorsePenis.label: equine penis
LanguageData.HorsePenis.description: A large penis that telescopically extends from the shaft, leaving a ring of skin in the middle. The flat head flares out during the climax.
LanguageData.HorseVagina.label: equine vagina
LanguageData.HorseVagina.description: A vagina with a gapping and deep opening, and a large clitoris that usually peeks out when erect. The outer lips form a straight, thin slit when closed.
LanguageData.CatPenis.label: feline penis
LanguageData.CatPenis.description: A penis with a pointy, strawberry-shaped head that is covered in tiny barbs. The barbs stimulate the walls of the lover's holes during sex.
LanguageData.CatVagina.label: feline vagina
LanguageData.CatVagina.description: A relatively small, but deep vagina. The clitoris is hidden inside, close to the opening. Fluffy.
LanguageData.DogPenis.label: canine penis
LanguageData.DogPenis.description: A penis that has a bulbous knot at the base. If fully inserted, the know will lock both lovers together for a long time.
LanguageData.DogVagina.label: canine vagina
LanguageData.DogVagina.description: A vagina with two holes: one is the vaginal opening, the other hides the clitoris. During heat the lips swell up, giving it the shape of a peach.
LanguageData.DragonPenis.label: dragon penis
LanguageData.DragonPenis.description: A large and thick penis that is covered in scaly plates on the underside, and large barbs around the head. At its base there is a bulbous knot that locks it inside when fully inserted.
LanguageData.DragonVagina.label: dragon vagina
LanguageData.DragonVagina.description: A gaping vagina that is protected by though and scaly outer lips.
LanguageData.RaccoonPenis.label: procyonine penis
LanguageData.RaccoonPenis.description: A thin penis with a small round head. The bone the supports the shaft has a prominent 'S' curve.
LanguageData.HemiPenis.label: hemipenis
LanguageData.HemiPenis.description: A small pair of symmetrical penises, which are often covered in tiny barbs. Each penis has its semen production system, thus can orgasm independently. They are used only for sex and nothing else.
LanguageData.CrocodilianPenis.label: crocodilian penis
LanguageData.CrocodilianPenis.description: A penis with a thick bulbous base, a rigid, bony shaft and a bulbous head. Due to the bone, it never gets flaccid, it just hides inside the body when not in use.
LanguageData.NarrowVagina.label: narrow vagina
LanguageData.NarrowVagina.description: A rather deep but very thin vagina.
LanguageData.NeedlePenis.label: needle-like penis
LanguageData.NeedlePenis.description: A very long, but also very thin penis that telescopically extends from the shaft.
LanguageData.RodentVagina.label: rodent vagina
LanguageData.RodentVagina.description: A tiny vagina built for the bare minimum of functions.
LanguageData.RodentPenis.label: rodent penis
LanguageData.RodentPenis.description: A tiny penis built for the bare minimum of functions.
LanguageData.CloacalPenis.label: cloacal penis
LanguageData.CloacalPenis.description: A male sex organ hidden inside the body. During sex, the hole is rubbed against the partner's in a genital "kiss", until sperm comes out.It shares its hole with the excretory organs.
LanguageData.CloacalVagina.label: cloacal vagina
LanguageData.CloacalVagina.description: A female, egg laying sex organ that shares its hole with the excretory organs.
LanguageData.UdderBreasts.label: udder
LanguageData.UdderBreasts.description: A group of four breasts with large nipples.
LanguageData.CloacalAnus.label: cloacal anus
LanguageData.CloacalAnus.description: An anus that share its hole with the reproductive organs.
